===Overview===
The Paiute People are Native Americans who traditionally dwell in California, Idaho, Nevada and Oregon.<ref>[[Wikipedia:Paiute people|Wikipedia]]</ref> Presumably, their history mirrors that of the real world.

===American Frontier===
During the days of the American Frontier, various tribes of the Paiute interacted with gunslinging heroes such as [[Blaine Colt (Earth-616)|Kid Colt]] and the [[Gunsmoke Kid (Earth-616)|Gunsmoke Kid]]. They were both allies and enemies of these heroes depending on the circumstances of the time.

A tribe of Paiute were briefly enslaved by an outlaw named Breed Borden and forced to work in his mine until they were liberated by Kid Colt.{{r|Kid Colt Outlaw #14}} Another tribe of was given phony guns and tricked into going to war against [[Comanche Nation (Earth-616)|Comanches]] of [[Grey Eagle (Earth-616)|Grey Eagle]], however the Comanche brave [[Red Warrior (Earth-616)|Red Warrior]] exposed the hoax. The two tribes wiped out the arms dealer and peace was restored.{{r|Red Warrior #5}}

Paiute chief Two-Arrows came to the aid of Kid Colt, directing him through the deadly Masabi desert.{{r|Two Gun Western #12}} Later, Kid Colt encountered a band of rebel Paiute's that were under the employ of crooked military officials at Fort Stag who used them to steal gold from government, they were wiped out by Kid Colt.{{r|Kid Colt Outlaw #29}} Another group of Paiutes faced starvation thanks to buffalo poaching until the poachers were stopped by the [[Matthew Masters (Earth-616)|Black Rider]].{{r|Outlaw Kid #1}}
